functions.name: healthcareapis_system_damage_response_policies_established
functions.description: Checks if system damage response policies are established.

functions.name: healthcareapis_critical_process_protection_enabled
functions.description: Checks if critical process protection is enabled.

functions.name: healthcareapis_electronic_protected_health_info_emergency_procedures
functions.description: Checks if emergency procedures for electronic protected health info are in place.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Healthcareapis API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
